name: AppMaps
author: MELONIQ.NET

sections.description:
Disables automatic updating geolocation in ClassiPress theme, and insert new box with map in admin to manually place marker.

Supported themes

  • ClassiPress

Supported languages

  • English

If You translated plugin to Your native language, please send it to me, and will attach it to next release.
E-mail address You will find on contact page.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the folder ‘appmaps’ to the ‘/wp-content/plugins/’ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Go to “Settings->AppMaps” menu and fill settings.
sections.faq:
Plugin doesn’t work for me, what to do?

Report it with details on support forum.
sections.changelog:
1.1

  • Changed to use Google Maps API v3

1.0

  • Initial release
